mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id as postId, p.title as postTitle, c.user_id as userId, u.display_name as userName, '' as userAvatar, c.parent_id as parentId, c.content, c.status, c.like_count as likeCount, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM comment_like cl WHERE cl.comment_id = c.id AND cl.user_id = #{userId}) as isLiked, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment cc WHERE cc.parent_id = c.id AND cc.deleted = 0) as replyCount FROM comment c LEFT JOIN post p ON c.post_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.deleted = 0 AND c.status = 'APPROVED' AND c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
